name: Flag The Capture
description:
Flag The Capture is a questionably-paced game where you take control over Flag Man. No need to capture the flag. Flag the enemy doughnuts carefully using stealth mode, wait patiently, and watch them being captured.

Credits: 

Code: Avram Ioan

Artwork: Nicu Mihai 

Soundtrack and SFX:  Sergiu Moldovan
